pos.desc: Developed features, wrote tests, debugged, maintained a promotions/sweepstakes platform consisting of a public-facing widget, an analytics dashboard, and internal configuration tools (all using Ruby on Rails).
Implemented an analytics workflow which processes 100M+ rows of data gathered from promotions/sweepstakes using Amazon Redshift and Elastic MapReduce.
??? Widget Refactoring + AJAX
??? Authentication schemes
??? HubSpot integration, mailing list integrations
??? Dev ops type of stuff
Automated retrieval of Facebook likes data from 50K platform users a day via Facebook's Graph API.
Resolved web application performance issues including high database cpu utilization, slow query performance, and slow web server response times.

loc.value: UCLA College Library Instructional Computing Commons

pos.desc: Implemented a RESTful web service with Java/JAX-RS which manages study room reservations.
Developed a PHP web application for IT helpdesk staff to visualize where devices are located.
Maintained several PHP web applications, including an outfacing informational public website, an internal staff website, and a tool to reserve group study rooms.
Assisted in overseeing laptop lending operations, consisting of about 200 Apple MacBook laptops.
Supervised and trained five student helpdesk workers with the goal of maintaining hardware in student computer labs and laptop lending operations.
Maintained hardware in student computer labs of about 160 desktop computers and 11 printers.
Proctored student computer labs; troubleshooted PC and Mac problems; provided customer service.
Improved usability of HP Wall Art's internal site/CMS by implementing batch upload of large files (upwards of 50MB) and AJAX-driven user interfaces, using Ruby on Rails and HTML5 File API.
Set up an OAuth provider and added RESTful endpoints for an API intended for third-party eCommerce integrations with HP Wall Art.

Developed a fully-functional prototype of an e-commerce product search page using the Apache Solr search platform and AJAX, supporting multi-tier faceted navigation by category, search bar autocomplete, and spellchecking.
Graded assignments for introductory C++ (PIC 10A) and multivariable calculus (Math 32B).

sec.name: Skills
sec.text: Proficient in Ruby/Ruby on Rails and SQL. Prior experience with C, Java, C++, JavaScript, PHP, Python, and MATLAB.
GNU/Linux, Mac OS X, Git, MySQL, MongoDB, Hive, and Apache Solr.

pos.value: Intelligent Switching between ZeroMQ and TCP/IP for Data Streams
pos.desc: Experimented with Unix socket programming and an alternative sockets library (ZeroMQ) to improve network throughput for data streams. Final project for M.S. degree.
Studied the effects of applying certain differential equations upon images for image segmentation using MATLAB.
Implemented an adaptive foreground detection algorithm for video in a group summer research project at UCLA Mathematics, using MATLAB and C++ with the OpenCV computer vision library.
